mapper.select: SELECT A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AS tncStdItemId ,B.TNC_STD_ITEM_NAME AS tncStdItemName ,A.TNC_STD_VAL1 AS tncStdVal1 ,A.TNC_STD_VAL2 AS tncStdVal2 ,A.TNC_STD_VAL3 AS tncStdVal3 FROM PD_TNC_STD AS A LEFT JOIN PD_TNC_STD_ITEM B ON A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID = B.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID WHERE A.STANDARD_ID = (SELECT tnc.STANDARD_ID FROM PD_STANDARD AS tnc WHERE tnc.CLASSESTREE_CODE = #{filterMap.classestreeCode}) ORDER BY A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID
